name: Rocket Goblin
description:
My Ludum Dare 49 Submission

Controls:

Use the up/down arrow keys to control the rocket. Avoid crashing into the walls, but hitting barricades will cause you to lose some speed. The longer you go without hitting any barricades, the faster you will go and the faster you will gain points. Although if you go too fast for too long, your rocket will explode.
